short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the unfollow button for Twitch streamers you follow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to hide/unhide the Twitch unfollow button so you never accidentally unfollow your favorite streamer again. Click on the extension icon in the extension list to bring up a checkbox to toggle the button hiding.
